summary.span: 使用 multipart/\* 编码将 HTTP 内容序列化到流。

span.span: Serializes the HTTP content to a stream using the multipart/\* encoding.

returns.span: HTTP 内容流，它表示 multipart/\* 编码的 HTTP 内容。

span.span: The HTTP content stream that represents the multipart/\* encoded HTTP content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将重写 为使用包含数组的自定义流，其中每个 HTTP 内容实体及其边界经过编码并序列 化为实例。This method overrides to use a custom stream that contains an array, with each HTTP content entity and its boundary encoded and serialized to a instance.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override System.Threading.Tasks.Task<System.IO.Stream> CreateContentReadStreamAsync ();
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class System.IO.Stream> CreateContentReadStreamAsync() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function CreateContentReadStreamAsync () As Task(Of Stream)
protected: override System::Threading::Tasks::Task<System::IO::Stream ^> ^ CreateContentReadStreamAsync();
override this.CreateContentReadStreamAsync : unit -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<System.IO.Stream>

summary.span: 以异步操作方式，使用 multipart/\* 编码将 HTTP 内容序列化到流。

span.span: Serializes the HTTP content to a stream using the multipart/\* encoding as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将重写 为使用包含数组的自定义流，并对每个 HTTP 内容及其边界进行编码并序列化为 实例。This method overrides to use a custom stream that contains an array, with each HTTP content and its boundary encoded and serialized to a instance. 此操作不会阻止。This operation will not block. 将所有内容写入内存流后，返回的对象将会完成。The returned object will complete after all of the content has been written to the memory stream. 操作完成后， 返回任务对象上的属性将包含表示多部分/\* 编码 HTTP 内容的流。Once the operation completes, the property on the returned task object contains the stream that represents the multipart/\* encoded HTTP content. 然后，可以使用各种流 Api 使用返回的流读取内容。The returned stream can then be used to read the content using various stream APIs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将重写 为使用包含数组的自定义流，并对每个 HTTP 内容及其边界进行编码并序列化为 实例。This method overrides to use a custom stream that contains an array, with each HTTP content and its boundary encoded and serialized to a instance. 此操作不会阻止。This operation will not block. 将所有内容写入内存流后，返回的对象将会完成。The returned object will complete after all of the content has been written to the memory stream. 操作完成后， 返回任务对象上的属性将包含表示多部分/\* 编码 HTTP 内容的流。Once the operation completes, the property on the returned task object contains the stream that represents the multipart/\* encoded HTTP content. 然后，可以使用各种流 Api 使用返回的流读取内容。The returned stream can then be used to read the content using various stream APIs.

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to releases only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 使用的非托管资源，并可根据需要释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally disposes of the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共 `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true` 。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Dispose`在设置为的情况调用 `disposing` `false` 。当 `disposing` 参数为时 `true` ，此方法释放该引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源 。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator<System.Net.Http.HttpContent> GetEnumerator ();

Public Function GetEnumerator () As IEnumerator(Of HttpContent)

abstract member GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator<System.Net.Http.HttpContent> override this.GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator<System.Net.Http.HttpContent>

summary.span: 返回循环访问 对象集合的枚举器，该对象集合使用多部分/\* 内容类型规范进行序列化。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the collection of objects that get serialized using the multipart/\* content type specification.

returns.span: 一个可用于循环访问集合的对象。

span.span: An object that can be used to iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks C# 语言的 foreach 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 For Each）隐藏了枚举器的复杂性。The foreach statement of the C# language (For Each in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 foreach，而不要直接操作枚举器。Therefore, using foreach is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection.

summary.span: 以异步操作方式，将多部分 HTTP 内容序列化到流。

span.span: Serialize the multipart HTTP content to a stream as an asynchronous operation.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override bool TryComputeLength (out long length);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance bool TryComputeLength([out] int64& length) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Function TryComputeLength (ByRef length As Long) As Boolean
protected public: override bool TryComputeLength([Runtime::InteropServices::Out] long % length);
override this.TryComputeLength : int64 -> bool

param.name: length
param.span: HTTP 内容的长度（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The length in bytes of the HHTP content.

summary.span: 确定 HTTP 多部分内容的长度是否有效（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Determines whether the HTTP multipart content has a valid length in bytes.

returns.span: 如果 是有效长度，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if is a valid length; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使 HTTP 多部分内容能够计算内容长度。The method gives HTTP multipart content the ability to calculate the content length. 这对于能够轻松计算内容长度的内容类型很有用。This is useful for content types which are able to easily calculate the content length. 如果无法计算内容长度，或成本较高 (需要系统缓冲序列化会消耗大量内存的整个内容，或者需要系统分配大量内存) ，则此方法可以返回 `false` 。If computing the content length is not possible or expensive (would require the system to buffer the whole content where the serialization would be expensive or require the system to allocate a lot of memory), this method can return `false`. 如果此方法返回 `false` ，则表示需要分块传输，或者必须在将内容发送到服务器之前缓冲内容。If this method returns `false`, this implies that either chunked transfer is needed or the content must get buffered before being sent to the server.
